short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Instead of doing another screen based thing, go outside, see the world, a reminder to do the positive activities in life

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
In a time long ago, when the web was just two computers having a chat, most of the populous spent their time engaged in hobbies and activities away from the screen, that cat videos were yet to be invented and a newsfeed was a local newspaper.

'Go Outside' is an extension to remind us that those hobbies still exist in the present time! 'Go Outside' presents a simple yet stark reminder each time a new tab is opened of a different customised activities you could be doing instead of mindlessly browsing the web looking at yet another cat video or scrolling yet another newsfeed.

New in 1.2.0: Chrome Extension will now work in an incognito tab, if the extension is enabled to work in incognito.
New in 1.1.0: Firefox plugin compatability and open the options page on first use.
